description: Sets of 4 numbers in arithmetic progression with common difference 6 and whose phi values are equal.
comments: This is really four sequences, not one! A050498 is a better version. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 01 2005
references: D. Wells, Curious and interesting numbers, Penguin Books, p. 112 (but beware errors).
maple: with(numtheory):for n from 1 to 1000000 do if(phi(n)=phi(n+6) and phi(n+6)=phi(n+12) and phi(n+12)=phi(n+18)) then printf("%d, %d, %d, %d, ",n,n+6,n+12,n+18) fi od: (Ronaldo)
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: More terms from C. Ronaldo (aga_new_ac(AT)hotmail.com), Dec 29 2004
